Endre Pap was born 26 February 1947 in Mali Iđoš in Vojvodina, Serbia, to an Hungarian family.

<Text: Endre Pap:  Full Professor since 1986 at the Faculty of Sciences of the university in Novi Sad.>
Triplets:<Endre Pap
8:
--------------------
<Text: Endre Pap:  He is now a full Professor of the university Singidunum in Belgrade.>
Triplets:<Endre Pap
9:
--------------------
Text: Endre Pap:  He was a president of Academy of Sciences and Arts of Vojvodina (VANU).
Triplets:<Endre Pap
10:
--------------------
<Text: Endre Pap:  He is now a corresponding member of European Academy of Sciences (EAS).
Triplets:<Endre Pap
11:
--------------------
Text: Endre Pap:  He is a member from the outside of the Public Organ of Hungarian Academy of Sciences, since 2000.
